assessment_item.title: LC4VMA-Q15-துணை நொதி A எதற்கு பயன்படுகிறது?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

துணை நொதி A எதற்கு பயன்படுகிறது?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ஆக்சிஜனேற்ற பாஸ்பரிகரணம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1858"},{"text":"

தளப்பொருள் பாஸ்பரிகரணம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1859"},{"text":"

பைருவேட்டை சிதைக்கிறது

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1989"},{"text":"

அசிடைல் தொகுதியை ஊக்குவிக்க

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1994"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"LC4VMA-Q15-துணை நொதி A எதற்கு பயன்படுகிறது?","title":"LC4VMA-Q15-துணை நொதி A எதற்கு பயன்படுகிறது?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"EASY","contentType":"Resource","mimeType":"application/vnd.ekstep.ecml-archive","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
